description: Collect all artifact values that match the desired CEF data types, such as "ip", "url", "sha1", or "all". Optionally also filter for artifacts that have the specified tags.

inputs.description: (Optional) Collect data from this container. Defaults to current container.
inputs.name: container

inputs.description: (Required) The CEF data type to collect values for. This could be a single string or a comma separated list such as "hash,filehash,file_hash". The special value "all" can also be used to collect all field values from all artifacts.
inputs.name: data_types

inputs.description: (Optional) Define custom scope and defaults to 'new'. Advanced Settings Scope is not passed to a custom function. Options are 'all' or 'new'.
inputs.name: scope

inputs.description: (Optional) Only return fields from artifacts that have all of the provided tags. This could be an individual tag or a comma separated list.
inputs.name: tags

outputs.description: ID of the artifact that contains the value.
The tags associated with the artifact
A list of keys from that artifact where this value appears. This will usually be a list of 1.
A list of cef types associated with this value
The value of the field with the matching CEF data type.
